Compatible with iOS 8, 9 and 10

Messages++ simillar to Phone++ introduces innovative and enhanced capabilties to the natvie Messages app. Messages++ Integrates popular social apps into the native Messages App as should have been designed by Apple. Easily connect to friends who use different social apps right from the native Messages App.

Easily make phone calls or send WhatsApp messages by simply swiping left or right on a contact and depending on how much information is populated for the contact profile in your address book different options appear accordingly. The user can easily configure the order as well as the look and feel of these options.

Messages++ supports the following social applications capabilties:
Skype Voice Call (make a voice call directly to a contact with a Skype account)
Skype Video Call (make a video call directly to a contact with a Skype account)
Skype Message (send a message directly to a contact with a Skype account)
WhatsApp Message (send a message directly to a contact with a WhatsApp account)
Twitter (will send you to the contact's twitter account)
Facebook (Will not send you to the contact's Facebook account but Facebook button will be displayed to let you know this contact has a Facebook account, if clicked you will be taken to Facebook app)

Messages++ provides an enhanced overall experience. By simply swiping left or right you can also have the following options:
Make a call
Send an SMS/iMessage
Send an Email
etc...

Messages++ provides powerful customization:

Overall configurations
Enable or disable Messages++ on the Favorites, Recents or Contacts tab.

UI
Easily choose the theme of your liking either icons with circles or icons with rectangles or an amazing looking Minimalistic icons UI.

Swiping
Easily configure the options you would like to appear when you swipe Left or Right.
Easily configure the color of each option whether it is an icon inside a circle or a rectangle or just an icon.

Gestures
Provide the ability to have different gestures when you tap, or short hold or click the detail accessory button on the right. Gestures are enabled only if Messages++ is enabled on the tab.

Messages++ has been under development for months. The idea is that Messages++ will hopefully support more social apps in the future such as Viber Calling, WhatsApp Calling and introduce more options to enhance the overall experience of the Messages app.
